name: GoHome (itch)
description:
Instructions

1. Start Menu: Move the player to the end of the right to start the
game.
Control: A-Moving left, D-Moving Right
2. The game starts.
3. Player swap matches on the right grid to move character on the
screen(leftside). 

Control:
LeftArrow-Moving Left, RightArrow-MovingRight, Up
Arrow-Moving Up, DownArrow-Moving Down
4. Time Counter: To add time to the counter, Mouse click the “ADD”
Button.
5. When the character arrived the house, the game ends

Note*

This game is a side project of an original game that is currently developing, using the same player character. 

All assets are created by ROK1006.

Developed by ROK1006.

FOLLOW Instagram Account @r_ok_ot for more of my other works and currently developing games.
